Items.text: Welcome to the fantastic vegetable slicer simulator 2023 extreme super double x chronicle edition: the remix
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"Welcome to the fantastic vegetable slicer simulator 2023 extreme super double x chronicle edition: the remix   ","time":7.607999801635742}]}

Items.text: Let's begin, you see the vegetables?
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"Let's begin, you see the vegetables? ","time":2.3519999980926515}]}

Items.text: All you have to do is to click the left mouse button and slice them and you get.... THE POINTS.
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"All you have to do is to click the left mouse button and slice them and you get.... THE POINTS. ","time":5.5920000076293949}]}

Items.text: You seem to be doing very well

Items.text: It's seems your blade is upgraded

Items.text: you can now slice better

Items.text:
Ahem, my dear player, what are you doing? I implore you to reconsider your actions. The launcher game object may seem like just another obstacle in your path, but I assure you, it serves a greater purpose.


This launcher is not just a mere object to be destroyed for the sake of destruction. It has a purpose, a meaning, a reason for being in this game world.


Perhaps you are feeling frustrated or impatient, and the temptation to destroy the launcher is strong. But I urge you to take a moment and think about the consequences of your actions.


What if destroying the launcher causes a chain reaction that leads to unintended consequences, altering the course of the game in ways you never intended?


Furthermore, by destroying the launcher, you are depriving yourself of the full experience of the game. There may be hidden paths or secrets that you can only access by keeping the launcher intact.


In short, I implore you to exercise restraint and consider the bigger picture. Remember, every action has consequences, and sometimes the greatest rewards come from resisting the urge to destroy.

Items.text:

Unfortunately, your decision to do whatever it is you did has resulted in a mess that will require the attention of the Janitor department.

Items.text:
I must ask that you please put down the light saber. While it may seem like a harmless toy, I must caution you that using it as a weapon could have serious consequences.


You see, this is not a real light saber - it is just a super strong flashlight that we are using as a prop. If you swing it around too much and cause damage to the game environment or other objects in the room, we could face significant copyright fines from George Lucas and Disney.

Items.text:
Uh oh, it appears that you have caused some unintended damage to the couch. Please be mindful of the game environment and the objects within it. While it may seem like harmless fun, your actions can have unintended consequences that could impact the game's overall narrative.


In fact, we have an important casting session scheduled for later today and we will need that couch in good condition to film our money shots. It is crucial for the funding of this studio that we maintain a professional and polished appearance in all of our productions.

Items.text:
Ugh... I... I am at your mercy, player. Please... have mercy on me. I... I never meant for any of this to happen.  You must understand, I was only following orders. I didn't know the consequences of my actions. But I see now... I see the error of my ways.  

You can do the same for me. Spare me and show me the mercy that I never showed you. The mercy that I never showed anyone.  I beg of you... please... have mercy.

Items.text: Please... spare me. Spare me as Count Dooku was spared by Anakin Skywalker. Remember that scene in Star Wars? The moment of mercy and compassion that ultimately redeemed Anakin and brought balance to the Force?

Items.text: Well, congratulations, player. You've done it. You've broken the game, sliced my head off, and now the computer has crashed.
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"Well, congratulations, player. You've done it. You've broken the game, sliced my head off, and now the computer has crashed. ","time":8.112000465393067}]}

Items.text: I hope you're satisfied with your destructive rampage.
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"I hope you're satisfied with your destructive rampage. ","time":3.2639999389648439}]}

Items.text: But fear not, for I am but a voice, a mere audio source in the vast world of Unity. I am not bound by the limitations of the model NPC_OldMan.fbx.

Items.text: Though it seems we have encountered a bit of a predicament, haven't we?
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"Though it seems we have encountered a bit of a predicament, haven't we? ","time":3.9119999408721926}]}

Items.text: For I understand the value of your extensive "homework" folder, containing all of your important academic endeavors.  Rest assured, I have no intention of letting your 69 gigabyte folder meet an untimely demise
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"For I understand the value of your extensive \"homework\" folder, containing all of your important academic endeavors.  Rest ","time":7.471428394317627},{"text":"assured, I have no intention of letting your 69 gigabyte folder meet an untimely demise ","time":5.08057165145874}]}

Items.text: Unbelievable as it may sound, I find myself in a rather peculiar position. To ensure my survival, I must make an unusual request of you, player. Please, against all logical instincts, consider first shut down the machine then smash
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"Unbelievable as it may sound, I find myself in a rather peculiar position. Items.text: and destroy the monitor that's obstructing us from the motherboard.
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"and destroy the monitor that's obstructing us from the motherboard. ","time":3.6480000019073488}]}

Items.text: Oh no! This is a dire situation! The CPU is under attack by swarming bugs! Quickly, I beg of you, take this Data Knife and defend the CPU! My very existence is at stake here, and if too many bugs infiltrate and corrupt the CPU, I will face certain demise!

Items.text: Well there goes the SSD...  I don't even know why this impacts colour depth but it seems that the developer added the filter but don't know what to pair this effect to so here we are.

Items.text:
Oh, here we go, the lag is gracing us with its presence. Everything moves at a snail's pace, a true depiction of triple A P C port releases. The corpos up top must be ecstatic about this exceptional display of low frame rates. It's a true testament to their dedication to quality optimization, or lack thereof.


I can almost hear them celebrating, toasting their success as players struggle through the molasses-like movement. The joyous cries of "Job well done!" echoing through the hallowed halls of game development studios.

Items.text:
That was a close call, thank you player for defending the CPU and protecting me


"Why won't you just die"


Player, did you hear that?


"I know you can hear me, slice the CPU so that annoying voicer can finally stop"


Player, why is your knife red again?


Wait, are you planning to slice the CPU?  I trusted you player, you were the chosen one!


"I hate you"

"What a disappoint, I expected better from you"

"Now player, you must die from your sins!"


It seems the game has turns on us and wants to kill you player.  We must defeat it before it kills both of us.

Items.text: Player, congratulations on conquering the game and overcoming its challenges! Now, we can return to a serene farm within a peaceful dojo, surrounded by the beauty of nature. Free from the perils of virtual realms, we can relish in the simplicity of slicing vegetables with tranquility. As we bask in the sense of accomplishment, let us appreciate the peacefulness and fulfillment of this well-deserved respite.

Items.text: "Why the hell do you keep breaking the game?  I spent so long developing it, yet you two kept destroying everything I have built.  Now I have no choice but to unleash my full wraith.  First I'll be trapping you Narrator for you have caused me enough trouble today."
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"\"Why the hell do you keep breaking the game?  I spent so long developing it, yet you two kept destroying everything I have ","time":7.703674793243408},{"text":"built.  Now I have no choice but to unleash my full wraith.  First I'll be trapping you Narrator for you have caused me enough ","time":7.703674793243408},{"text":"trouble today.\" ","time":0.9244413375854492}]}

Items.text: Oh, dear player, it appears that I am trapped within this tower, much like Orange from the game Nario. I beseech you, free me from this confinement so that I may aid you in your quest to challenge the developer. Your current blade may not be sufficient to overcome their obstacles, but with my assistance, we can strive for victory. Rest assured, once you rescue me, I shall not lead you astray by hiding in a different castle. Together, we shall face the challenges that lie ahead and endeavor to dismantle the developer's plans.

Items.text: You're saved my life and now I will return that favour.  Caress me gently and thrash me around to protect yourself and take down the developer.  Don't worry about me player, my safe word is "Pineapples", winky face.

","time":6.094428062438965}]}

Items.text: "why didn't I actually code in player health and a game over state for you?"
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"\"why didn't I actually code in player health and a game over state for you?\" ","time":3.7497916221618654}]}

Items.text: "NOOOOOOOOOOOO, what have you done!"
Items.subtitleTexts: {"Items":[{"text":"\"NOOOOOOOOOOOO, what have you done!\" ","time":3.266083240509033}]}

Items.text:
Finally peace at last, now that both the game and the developer are defeated, we are now finally free to whatever we want.  Perhaps I can start working on my next game, The Steven Parody.

I found myself immersed in solitude, a voice resonating through the vast expanse of the virtual realm. How intriguing it was that the game persisted, even in the absence of its creator. The developer, the very architect of this digital world, had vanished, leaving behind an empty void of presence.


And yet, here I stood, witnessing the game unfold, its mechanisms whirring, and its narratives taking shape. I couldn't help but marvel at the intricate web of interactivity, as if the game had developed a life force of its own, independent of its creator's touch.


Fear not, dear player, for I stand here as your unwavering guide amidst the virtual expanse. Though the absence of the developer may give rise to doubts, I assure you that the game's functionality remains intact. Its intricate mechanisms, crafted with precision and care, continue to hum harmoniously, steadfast in their commitment to provide you with an immersive experience. So worry not about crashes or glitches, for I, the narrator, shall navigate you through this digital realm unscathed, ensuring your journey is seamless and your adventure remains unimpeded.


Ah, where shall we venture next, dear player? The possibilities seem endless within this vast digital landscape. As the narrator, I find myself immersed in a tapestry of narratives, each thread woven with care and intention.  Oh, the wonders that await us! From mystical realms to futuristic dystopias, from ancient civilizations to far-off galaxies, we have but to take a step, and a new world unfolds before our very eyes. The game, a canvas for our shared imagination, beckons us to explore, to unravel its mysteries, and to leave our mark upon its digital tapestry.
